event.executesql: ALTER VIEW dbo.DDACONTROL WITH SCHEMABINDING AS SELECT dbo.DDACONTROL1.Z_ID, dbo.DDACONTROL1.SHORT_NAME, dbo.DDACONTROL1.BRCH, dbo.DDACONTROL1.SOC_SEC, dbo.DDACONTROL1.DATE_OPN, dbo.DDACONTROL2.ATM_POS_CNTR, dbo.DDACONTROL2.FRN_ATM_WDLS, dbo.DDACONTROL2.B_NOTC_DT, dbo.DDACONTROL2.B_NOTC_ADV, dbo.DDACONTROL2.PREV_B_NOTC, dbo.DDACONTROL2.PREV_ADV_DT, dbo.DDACONTROL2.LOW_BAL,
